Message.MsgText: bbson.unexpected.exception=CWOBB9990E: Method {0} caught exception: {1}
Message.Explanation: An exception was caught in the specified method.
Message.UserResponse: None

Message.MsgText: GENL_WARN=CWOBB9998E: Something suspicious happened; the data (if any) is {0} and the exception (if any) is {1}.
Message.Explanation: The overlay-based bulletin board encountered a condition that might or might not indicate a problem.
Message.UserResponse: If this happens a lot then report to IBM.

Message.MsgText: BBF_DUMPED=CWOBB1005I: The overlay-based bulletin board wrote its internal state, in concrete form to {0} and in abstract form to {1}.
Message.Explanation: This is controlled by the cell custom property named bbson.DUMP_TIMEOUT; set it to a number of minutes or deleted it to have no dumps.
Message.UserResponse: Update the cell custom property if you want to change the behavior.

Message.MsgText: IMgr_NodeJoin=CWOBB3003E: The overlay reported the arrival of a already-present process {0} with epoch {1} (the process was already present with epoch {2}).
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: IMgr_NodeLeft2=CWOBB3002E: The overlay reported multiple departures of process {0} with epoch {1}
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: Cfg_Given=CWOBB0001I: The overlay-based bulletin board has been configured with a value of {1} for the parameter named {0} (the default, possibly dependent on other configuration settings, was {2}).
Message.Explanation: This message reports on an explicit configuration setting from a cell custom property.
Message.UserResponse: Change or remove the setting if the current setting is not desired.

Message.MsgText: IMgr_NodeLeft1=CWOBB3001E: The overlay reported the departure of an unknown process {0} with epoch {1}.
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: BBF_Broke=CWOBB1001I: The overlay-based bulletin board has failed to initialize in process {0} in core group {1} in cell {2}.
Message.Explanation: The bulletin board is not functional due to an initialization problem.
Message.UserResponse: See the earlier CWOBB1004E message.

Message.MsgText: GENL_ERR=CWOBB9999E: Something unexpected happened; the data (if any) is {0} and the exception (if any) is {1}.
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: BBS_ConfigHAM=CWOBB2001I: The cell's configuration calls for the use of the HAManager's implementation of the Bulletin Board.
Message.Explanation: The alternative is the overlay-based implementation.
Message.UserResponse: If the overlay-based implementation is desired, create a cell custom property named 'WXDBulletinBoardProviderOption' with a value of 'WXD'.

Message.MsgText: BBF_Callback_Throw=CWOBB1003E: The Bulletin Board subscriber {3} for board {0}, scope {1}, and subject {2} threw an exception or error {4}.
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: Cfg_Bad1000=CWOBB0003E: The overlay-based bulletin board was configured with an invalid value ({0}) to use as the broadcast threshold when the system has 1000 processes; the threshold used in that case will be {1}.
Message.Explanation: The overlay-based bulletin board will disseminate an update via broadcast if the system size is at least the broadcast threshold; the broadcast threshold is derived by geometrically interpolating between two given points, one of which is the broadcast threshold to use when the system contains 1000 processes. That threshold is configured by a cell custom property named bbson.BROADCAST_THRESHOLD_FOR_1000.
Message.UserResponse: Correct the configuration.

Message.MsgText: BBF_KnownJoin=CWOBB1010W: Join notification for (process, epoch) ({0}, {1}) which is already in the view with the same epoch.
Message.Explanation: Received join notification for a process that is currently in view.
Message.UserResponse: No action required.

Message.MsgText: IMgr_Init=CWOBB3000I: The bulletin board interest aware membership service has initialized.
Message.Explanation: The service is part of the overlay-based implementation of the bulleting board and should be active in every process of a system using that implementation.
Message.UserResponse: Informational message only, no action required.

Message.MsgText: MSG_ERR=CWOBB9996E: Something suspicious happened; the data (if any) is {0} and the exception (if any) is {1}.
Message.Explanation: The overlay-based bulletin board received a network message that was malformed; this should not happen.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: BBF_STATS=CWOBB1007I: Cumulative bulletin board factory statistics are {0}, rates since previous stats are {1}.
Message.Explanation: This is a periodic printout of the bulletin board factory statistics.
Message.UserResponse: Information only; no action required.

Message.MsgText: BBF_Rejoined=CWOBB1009W: Process {0} rejoined.
Message.Explanation: Received join notification of a previously known process.
Message.UserResponse: There are a variety of temporary circumstances which may cause this message, and often it can be ignored.รก However, if the message occurs

Message.MsgText: BBF_DelayedReceipt=CWOBB1011W: Received message from (process, epoch) ({0}, {1}) at time {2}; (process, epoch) in ProcessEpoch is ({0}, {3}) was received at {4}.
Message.Explanation: Received a message from the indicated process that took longer than expected.
Message.UserResponse: No action required.

Message.MsgText: BBS_ConfigSON=CWOBB2000I: The cell's configuration calls for the use of the overlay-based implementation of the Bulletin Board.
Message.Explanation: The alternative is the older implementation in the HAManager.
Message.UserResponse: If the older implementation is desired, remove the cell custom property named 'WXDBulletinBoardProviderOption' or give it a value different from 'WXD'.

Message.MsgText: BBF_NoPeer=CWOBB1004E: There was an unexpected exception while initializing the SON overlay; the exception is {0}.
Message.Explanation: This should not happen. It can be caused by a problem with the configuration or a conflicting other process(es). This process will be unable to communicate in certain important ways unless and until the problem is corrected and this process is restarted.
Message.UserResponse: Consider the details in the exception. Correct any configuration problem, eliminate conflicting use of the configured port(s), or report to IBM.

Message.MsgText: IMgr_OldJoin=CWOBB3004W: The overlay reported the arrival of process {0} with epoch {1} when it was last seen with greater epoch {2}.
Message.Explanation: This should only happen under extremely rare circumstances when there are many problems with the network.
Message.UserResponse: Report to IBM if this message is appearing frequently or when there are not many problems in the network.

Message.MsgText: BBF_LoopbackConnection=CWOBB1006E: The overlay-based bulletin board on process {0} got TCP connection from itself.
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: Cfg_BadFloor=CWOBB0002E: The overlay-based bulletin board was configured with a minimum broadcast threshold of {0}, which is invalid; the bulletin board will use a minimum broadcast threshold of 1.
Message.Explanation: The overlay-based bulletin board will disseminate an update via broadcast if the system size is at least the broadcast threshold; the minimum broadcast threshold is configured by a cell custom property named bbson.BROADCAST_FLOOR.
Message.UserResponse: Correct the configuration.

Message.MsgText: BBF_Init=CWOBB1000I: The overlay-based bulletin board has been initialized in process {0} in core group {1} in cell {2}.
Message.Explanation: Informational message only.
Message.UserResponse: No action required.

Message.MsgText: BBF_ClockJerk=CWOBB1002W: The local machine clock has jumped backwards at least {0} milliseconds: a reading of {1} ({2}) was followed, some time later, by a reading of {3} ({4}).
Message.Explanation: A large backwards change in the clock is problematic for the Bulletin Board implementation, which will cope as best it can. The exact magnitude of the jump is unknown, and the coping will be approximate.
Message.UserResponse: Do not do that.

Message.MsgText: BBF_DelayedJoin=CWOBB1008W: Join notification for (process, epoch) ({0}, {1}) at time {2}; (process, epoch) in the current view is ({0}, {3}) was received at {4}.
Message.Explanation: Receipt of join notification for the indicated process took longer than expected.
Message.UserResponse: No action required.

Message.MsgText: Proc_SendQueueOrder=CWOBB1200W: The process queue of the bulletin board had a surprising entry (for the process named {3}, with send time {4} = {5}); this was discovered when inserting an entry for the process named {0} with send time {1} = {2}.
Message.Explanation: This exception is unexpected. The cause is not immediately known.
Message.UserResponse: If the problem persists, additional information might be available if you search for the message ID on the following Web sites: WebSphere Application Server Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/was/support/ WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Support page: http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/zos_os390/support/ .

Message.MsgText: BBF_UnknownReceipt=CWOBB1012W: Received message from (process, epoch) ({0}, {1}) which is not in the current view at time {2}; (process, epoch) in ProcessEpoch is ({0}, {3}).
Message.Explanation: Received a message from a process that is not in the current view.
Message.UserResponse: No action required.

Message.MsgText: bbson.exception=CWOBB9991E: Error happened:{0}
Message.Explanation: Unexpected Error happened.
Message.UserResponse: None
